meanings.definition: A man who is excessively masculine or macho in behavior.
meanings.sent1: The supermacho at the gym lifted weights that were heavier than anyone else.
meanings.sent2: He always wore a leather jacket and rode a motorcycle, trying to look supermacho.
meanings.sent3: The supermacho thought he was tough until he screamed at the sight of a tiny spider.
meanings.sent4: His supermacho attitude was like a shield, hiding his insecurities from others.
meanings.sent5: The image of the supermacho man with a big beard and muscles stuck in everyone's minds.

meanings.definition: Displaying an exaggerated or extreme form of masculinity.
meanings.sent1: The wrestler's supermacho behavior in the ring intimidated his opponents.
meanings.sent2: He tried to act supermacho by always talking loudly and showing off his muscles.
meanings.sent3: His supermacho posturing made everyone laugh because he tripped over his own feet.
meanings.sent4: The supermacho persona he put on was like a costume, hiding his true self.
meanings.sent5: The cologne he wore was so strong, it gave off a supermacho scent that lingered in the room.
